IX.iii.1.F.4.g
.
Example 3:  Removing the Income of Dependents
Situation
:  A married Veteran’s award is effective August 7, 2014.  The Veteran is paid based on IVAP of $3,600.  The $3,600 represents the spouse’s wages of $300 per month.  The spouse dies on November 13, 2014.  The total earned income received by the spouse between August 7, 2014, and November 13, 2014, was $1,200.
Result
:  IVAP is $1,200 from September 1, 2014.  Pay the Veteran at the single Veteran rate based on IVAP of $0 from December 1, 2014.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section F - Dependents for Current-Law Pension Purposes
